page.title: 13Homelife in Morecambe
page.content:
A day in the life of Ian aged 9.
When I get up in the morning I have Kellogs Special K for breakfast. On this particular morning I am going to school. After breakfast I get dressed and clean my teeth. When I have finished doing that I get my apple and my coat, say goodbye to my mum and go to school. When I get to school it is about 8.30 a.m. When I get there I play about until the whistle goes, and then I go into school, put my coat on my hook and go into class. When I am in class Miss calls the names on the register, and then we go across the playground and up the steps to St Barnabas Church for Assembly.
